Html: Does oxite cache any data or output?  If not, are their any plans to implement any?

No, we do not provide any caching yet.  Do you have a site that isn't working well because of high traffic?  Caching's a big job that we're still working out how we might build.  We have lots of ideas, but haven't implemented anything into Oxite yet.

If you take a look at the latest source code though we have done custom caching for the new MIX Videos site (under /Oxite/Implementations/MIXVideos) that is specific to that site so you could take a look at that for ideas if you want to do your own for now.

No high traffic sites yet, but I did get my personal blog up and running on the latest release. :) http://sleekdigital.com

This is very helpful info. Thanks again and keep up the good work.

Looks good.  I've added your site to the list of sites running Oxite.

You're welcome!
